ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Proof_of_Concept", AND( ISBLANK(TEXT( POC_Outcome__c )), ISBLANK( POC_Feedback_Notes__c ), ISBLANK( POC_End_Date__c ), ISBLANK( Win_Loss_Reason_Details__c ) ), AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost") )), NOT(OR($Profile.Name="System Administrator",$User.Division="Finance")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: POC Outcome, POC Feedback Notes, POC End Date, Win/Loss Reason must be complete to change stage to Closed Won or Closed Lost
